project_name: Animal-based products vs Plant-based producuts from an efficiency standpoint
author: Jonathan Suárez Cáceres
project_title: What foods are more efficient when thinking from a cost-benefit (resources-nutritional value) point of view
project_description: Is eating animal products efficient or is there a more sustainable way to eat?
